question.title: Sort Transformed Array
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Squares of a Sorted Array", "titleSlug": "squares-of-a-sorted-array", "difficulty": "Easy", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Minimum Time to Repair Cars", "titleSlug": "minimum-time-to-repair-cars", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: x^2 + x  will form a parabola.

Parameter A in:  A * x^2 + B * x + C dictates the shape of the parabola.</br>
Positive A means the parabola remains concave (high-low-high), but negative A inverts the parabola to be convex (low-high-low).
x^2 + x  will form a parabola.

Positive A means the parabola remains concave (high-low-high), but negative A inverts the parabola to be convex (low-high-low).
